alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 6:30PM CDT until July 27 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Taylor County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jump River to 6 miles northeast of Cornell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Jump River around 635 PM CDT. Westboro around 700 PM CDT. Chelsea around 705 PM CDT. Rib Lake around 710 PM CDT. Medford around 715 PM CDT. People attending the Taylor County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
